entry.title: Libprelude - Bug #290: Binding Python and Perl
entry.content:
• Status changed from New to Closed
  • Resolution set to invalid

Hello,

If you want to compile Prelude from sources, you need the development headers for perl and python (something like perl-devel/python-devel). However, if you are new to Linux, packages will be easier.

Please note trac is for code/rulesets issues and of you want to communicate with the community, please register to the prelude user mailing list here: http://lists.prelude-ids.org/mailman/listinfo/prelude-user

entry.title: Libprelude - Bug #290: Binding Python and Perl
entry.content:
